name: haproxy
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.install:all: npm i; concurrently 'cd react; npm i' 'cd backend; npm i'
scripts.compile: concurrently 'cd backend; npm run build' 'cd react; npm run build'
scripts.bundle: npm run clean; npm run compile; mkdir build; cp -r react/build ./build/public; cp -r backend/build/* ./build/
scripts.dev: MODE=development concurrently 'cd backend; npm run dev' 'cd react; npm run start'
